item.title: Going Green Office Tips
item.description: Let’s commemorate Earth Day by remembering that every day presents an opportunity to minimize waste and enhance energy efficiency. This approach is not only ethically sound but also financially beneficial. Let’s pinpoint some straightforward adjustments we can implement and evaluate their impact as we progress. My compact office used to be unbearably hot in the summer and excessively warm even during Northern Illinois winters. Upon closer inspection, it became evident that several computers, a monitor, a TV, printers, overhead lights, and desk lamps were emitting a substantial amount of heat.
